title: Keypad FREE

title: Hospital Lobby
long_description:
1950s Hospital Lobby – Asset Pack


Design a compelling entry point for your medical-themed games or cinematic projects with this detailed 1950s Hospital Lobby environment. This asset pack captures the clean, functional architecture of a post-war hospital setting, offering modular flexibility and low-poly optimization to help you build interactive, performance-friendly spaces.

Perfectly suited for isometric level design, this pack brings authenticity and structure to the central hub of your hospital environment — where tension builds, stories begin, or characters wait in uneasy silence.


Key Features:

  • Modular Construction System – Mix and match wall and floor elements to create lobbies of various shapes and scales. Ideal for grid-based isometric scenes and quick environment prototyping.

  •  Period-Accurate Props – Furnished with 1950s-style benches, check-in counters, notice boards, coat racks, indoor plants, and lighting fixtures.

  • Isometric-Ready Presentation – Built with game readability in mind, ensuring clean silhouettes and well-balanced layouts from fixed camera perspectives.

  •  Optimized for Real-Time Use – All models are low poly and carefully UV-mapped for seamless use in Unity, Unreal, and other engines.

  • Cinematic Versatility – Set the stage for intros, flashbacks, or dramatic moments with a believable mid-century medical environment.

Whether you're designing an old hospital for a narrative game or staging a moody cutscene, this pack provides everything you need to build a realistic and visually grounded lobby environment.

title: Augmented Reality WebGL -‎‎‏ ‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ Image Tracking WebAR
short_description: Make image tracking augmented reality experiences on the web! It's super fast and precise!
long_description:
This plugin allows you to have image tracking AR on the web. It allows you to detect an image and place content on top of it. You can use this to show 3d model(s), video(s), etc, on top of a business card for marketing for example.


FEATURES


You can track a single image or multiple (at the same time or not). The information of the tracked image(s) can then be used to place content from your Unity scene on top of the image.


An example Monobehavior script is provided so you can do this easily and right away - you just need to attach it to a gameobject, and all of its children will be placed on top of the target image.


You can tell when a target is lost or found, so that you can make the content disappear or reappear for example.


You can configure parameters to reduce jittering and make the experience more smooth.



TRY IT YOURSELF


It's the fastest on the market. It works well even on lower end devices, not just high end ones. Don't believe me? Check it out here. The number on the top right corner is the fps from EasyFpsCounter (not included).


Here are both of the images that can be tracked in the example

  1. Bear
  2. Raccoon

COMPLEMENTARY PLUGINS


You can take AR screenshots with the free ScreenshotWebGL.


You can record your AR experience using the DeviceCameraWebGL + Recorder WebGL combo (this also enables you to take AR screenshots using the official API, so the aforementioned free plugin becomes unnecessary).


You can share/download your AR screenshot/recording with ShareNSaveWebGL.


BROWSER SUPPORT


I tested on the most famous browsers. It works on the following:

Android: Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Opera, Samsung Internet.

iOS: Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Opera, Safari.


LIMITATIONS


You can not define the images that will be tracked at runtime. They need to be compiled beforehand and provided at build time. This means that you need to know the image(s) that you want to track before the experience starts.


Plugin is only 3.27MB including the library files and target image stored locally. The rest is the documentation pdf and example scene which uses 3d models and images. If you remove even the libraries and compiled image to reference them from a remote server or CDN, the size goes down ~64KB.


If you like my plugin, please consider leaving a review. It helps me immensely and encourages me to improve the plugin further, and other people to support my work :).


DO YOU WANT FACE TRACKING VTO ?


Check out the new Augmented Reality WebGL -‎‎‏ Face Tracking Virtual Try On.


DO YOU WANT LOOK AROUND AR ?


Try out this 360 AR experience using GyroscopeAccelerometerWebGL and DeviceCameraWebGL.

This integration supports multiple Notion API fields and endpoints, though it may not have support for all available workflows.

In case some specific field or endpoint that may be required by the project is not supported, requests can be made to update the integration.


Keep in mind some specific workflows may require functionalities not supported by the Notion API. In this case, support can't really be added to the integration.


Entire Source Code Included

Change, add or improve any core logic at any time. No obfuscated code or weird DLLs.

title: Simple Technology Kitbash #6
short_description:
Delicious Visualization & Delightful Geometry. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kitbash pack for detail-work and building your scenes or levels.
long_description:
Support, Questions, News & Updates

➡️ Facebook | Instagram | https://linktr.ee/onepotatokingdom


Deceptively simple and clean mechanical engineering mesh kitbash. Very loosely created from real life blueprints with some interpretation. Used in detail-work but works well for almost anything from learning to kit-bashing and level design.


⚡⚡Check out more packages here⚡⚡


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Every mesh is UV-unwrapped/Watertight (Manifold) and comes with 2 sets of stylized textures. Clean topology.


Release your creativity and use your time effectively. Don't waste precious time on tedious tasks when you could be spending it making the next digital Mona Liza!1


Every image is rendered in the HD-pipeline same as the demoscene. Every material was created with the HD-pipeline. Easy to convert or apply your own materials textures.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

🎮Quick Tips🎮



-For URP. Remove MaskMap/BaseMap and keep Normal to apply your own pipeline-specific material. URP materials not included by default.


-Use the search function to locate what you need. Everything is named accordingly.


-You can quickly Re-bake any mesh in your favorite application due to being unwrapped. FBX files are located in your project_folder.


-This is a industry/sci-fi kitbash pack. Do not expect trees, flowers and rigged mooses.



If you do purchase this package, thank you very much! Consider leaving a rating and review so others can find out what's what about it! If you have any problems, requests or anything else, send me a mail.

title: Countryside – Nature Ambiences Edition
short_description: Rich and authentic tapestry of everyday village sounds
long_description:
Bring the peaceful charm of rural life into your creative projects with Countryside – Nature Ambiences Edition — a high-quality sound library featuring 17 immersive stereo recordings captured in pristine 48 kHz / 24-bit audio.

This collection offers a rich and authentic tapestry of everyday village sounds, perfect for use in film, video games, podcasts, meditation tracks, or any audio project that needs a natural, grounded atmosphere.

Included are real-life recordings of:

  • Birds chirping in the early morning light
  • Dogs barking in the distance, giving a sense of lived-in space
  • Cars passing by on quiet rural roads
  • Crickets filling the evening air with their rhythmic song
  • Chickens clucking and scratching the ground around a rustic farm

Whether you're building a peaceful game world, enhancing a nature documentary, or just looking for real-world ambiences to relax to, Countryside – Nature Ambiences Edition gives you a vivid, organic sound palette that brings village life to life.

Ideal for prototypes or production-ready card games, this toolkit helps you focus on game design, not boilerplate setup.

Features

  • 🪢 Outfit presets.

  • 💇 Hairstyles.
  • 👚 Clothes with up to 32 unique slots.
  • 🖋️ Tatoos with up to 32 unique slots.
  • 💍 Attachments with up to 32 unique slots.
  • 💾 Saving & loading of outfit users & presets.
  • 📹 Outfit user system to track outfits across scenes and sessions.
  • 📈 Simple UI to control and manage all features.
  • 👧 Demo woman with various outfits, clothes, attachments, hairstyles, and tatoos.
  • ⚡ Powerful editor event integration.
  • ⏪ Full editor undo support.
  • 📝 Outstanding documentation and video tutorials.
  • 👨‍🏫 Great for beginners and professionals.

Low CPU Overhead. "Outfit System" is extremely efficient and takes up minimal disk space. Most of the listed file size is made up of demo content.


Well documented. comes with demo scenes, hand-written documentation, tutorial videos, and a generated API reference.

title: Fantasy RPG Music Vol. I: Midnight Magicks
short_description: An all-in-one fantasy RPG OST filled with charm and wonder. 10 magical tracks to bring whimsy, mystery, and adventure to your game’s world, battles, and story moments.
long_description:
“Fantasy RPG Music Vol. I: Midnight Magicks” is a whimsical and mysterious music asset pack designed to immerse players in the enchanting world of a Fantasy RPG. Set within the abandoned Mage College of Runekeep—a realm shimmering with magickally charged crystals, cantankerous critters, and long-forgotten secrets—this collection features 10 original tracks crafted to breathe life into your game's environments, characters, and pivotal moments.

Each piece uses musical storytelling through motifs and leitmotifs, supported by a magickal orchestration of woodwinds, strings, harps, idiophones (such as glockenspiel, celeste, xylophone, and bowed vibraphone), and light percussion to create a rich, cohesive fantasy atmosphere. The result is a sound that sparkles with wonder while hinting at the deeper mysteries beneath.

Includes 10 loopable tracks:

  1. Midnight Magicks (Title Theme)
    1. The magickal heart of the album—a whimsical, mysterious, and adventurous main theme that weaves in key motifs and leitmotifs heard throughout the collection. Ideal for title screens or opening cutscenes.
  2. Starlit Stones (Event Theme)
    1. A gentle, lightly layered track perfect for narrative moments and foreshadowing. Establishes the album’s core magickal and mysterious themes with a sense of quiet wonder.
  3. Whimsies of a Wanderer (Character Theme)
    1. Gently captures the innocence and curiosity of a young adventurer stepping into a world of unknowns.
  4. Overgrown Overlook (Explore Theme)
    1. Magickal and adventurous with an undercurrent of tension—this track sets the stage for early exploration just beyond the walls of Runekeep. Perfect for open-world wandering with a sense of mystery.
  5. Petalstorm Pursuit (Battle Theme)
    1. A dynamic battle theme that balances tension and whimsy—great for fast-paced but lighthearted encounters.
  6. Dewdrop Dreams (Event Theme)
    1. Soft, dreamy, and magickal—perfect for moments of rest, recovery, or introspection. Great for shops, inns, or quiet narrative sequences.
  7. Glistening Gardens (Explore Theme)
    1. Evokes serene beauty and hidden enchantment—ideal for tranquil exploration sequences with a touch of wonder.
  8. Critter Cavern (Dungeon Theme)
    1. Dynamic and tense with a quirky edge—this track drives home the unpredictable nature of dungeon exploration. Ideal for sub-areas filled with strange creatures and chaotic encounters.
  9. Whispers in the Wisps (Explore Theme)
    1. Haunting yet whimsical, this track explores the eerier corners of Runekeep. Mysterious, unsettling, and perfect for more antagonist-focused exploration inside the college grounds.
  10. Magickal Might (Battle Theme)
    1. Menacing and mysterious, this battle theme marks a turning point—your first confrontation with the antagonist. Built from evolved motifs, it captures the power and threat of the story’s darker forces.

Whether you're scoring an emotional cutscene, a magickal exploration, or a whimsical battle, Midnight Magicks offers a versatile and immersive foundation for any fantasy project.

I mainly drew inspiration from some of my favorite composers, their games, and the emotional storytelling techniques & immersive soundscapes they crafted. I have a love for all things magickal, whimsical, light-hearted, and mysterious, so putting it all together was an incredibly fun & fulfilling experience.


Technical Details:

  • 10 original high-quality loops, with 9 adaptive intro sections:
    • .wav
    • 48kHz / 24-bit
    • -14 LUFS
  • ~34 mins of music.
  • ~550 MB total file size.
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License.
  • README.txt on how to properly loop “Intro” and “IntroLoop” into “Loop”.

Credits:

  • Composition, Arrangement, Mixing, and Mastering by Zach Bruno (https://www.zachbrunomusic.com)

title: Drakkar Cybernetics Vol. 1
short_description: Drakkar Cybernetics – Vol. 1 brings you the Cyber Ninja & Cyber Samurai: high-detail, modular robots with advanced shaders, customizable materials, vinyls, interchangeable parts and sci-fi weapons.
long_description:
Drakkar Cybernetics – Vol. 1 introduces two highly detailed robotic warriors: the Cyber Ninja and the Cyber Samurai. Designed for both cinematic and real-time applications, these models offer exceptional quality without compromising performance.

Both characters feature modular parts, allowing you to mix and match arms, legs, torsos, and heads to create unique variations. The package includes 15 base skins and customizable vinyl decals to further personalize their appearance.


A custom shader system provides extensive material customization, from simple color adjustments to advanced effects like carbon fiber textures and depth-enhancing details. Two shader versions are available—one optimized for performance and another featuring Parallax Occlusion Mapping for an enhanced visual experience.


The set also includes a selection of weapons inspired by traditional ninja and samurai arsenals, such as katanas, wakizashis, kama, and shuriken.

With high detail, modular customization, and advanced materials, this pack is the perfect addition to any sci-fi project in Unity.

title: NaturalFront Face Animation Plugin Pro - 2021.1
long_description:
If you are under-funded or under-trained, and want to create professional 3D-face-animation in a tiny fraction of time and cost, this is the asset for you.

The software empowers pros and novices alike to vastly cut down the cost and time in creating expressive 3D characters. You can painlessly create custom-built, realistic 3D heads. Once created, the 3D-models will automatically have professional-quality 3D animation built-in.

Without any need for rigging, morphing, key-framing or motion capture, you can instantly get facial expressions and mouth-shapes you want, and blend them together, all by a few simple mouse-clicks. The high-quality animation will be successful the first time and every time, using our unique 1-Click Animation.

The Pro-version will enable users to export customized high-quality 3D-heads and unlimited realistic animation to FBX files. The 3D-models and animation can instantly run in other 3D apps and be imported into other scenes of Unity.

After using the Unity Plugin, you would agree that, if you can get your own face to generate expressions and talk with no effort, your 3D creations should also be able to do so!

Our patented technology is especially aimed at meeting your needs at a very high-level. So please let us know how you want to use the software. Together we can make a difference, by kissing goodbye to conventionally time-consuming and labor-intensive techniques in 3D face animation.

Please read this thread for the latest development of 1Click3D software.

Please note:

* You can create as many animated 3D-models as you want, and complete all the work within Unity.

* The Pro-version plugin only works on 64-bit Windows computers.

* The Windows version offers realtime photo-to-3D modeling.

title: XRKJ (XR Kinematic Joystick)
short_description: An XR joystick for use with Unity's XR Interaction Toolkit.
long_description:
What makes XRKJ special?

  • XRKJ's handle mesh will alwayse face forward (direct quaternions are used for rotational values).
  • The joystick works predictably in any orientation, including upside down and at an angle.
  • XRKJ was deisgned to be as user firendly as possible while maintainting accessibility and options for advanced users.

Is it easy to use?

XRKJ is an almost plug-and-play joystick designed for use with Unity's XR Interaction toolkit. Out of the box, the joystick is grabbable and can be maniuplated, all you need to do is write recieving code for the object you want to control (The included demo scene has examples of different ways the joystick(s) can be used).


What is it good for?

This asset is great for creating things like arcade games and claw machines. However, it is essentially just a directional controller so you can control anything that uses a value.


Downsides

You will need to know how to write some C# to add logic to the objects you want to controll, unless using one of the demo scripts is enough for your purposes.

title: RMH Narcotics Dispenser 001
long_description:
RMH Narcotics Dispenser 001.

Essentially, this is a concept of an e-cigarette and a bong (creating an 'e-bong' ??); the small red capsule would contain a drug/nicotine mix, this being vapourised when the blue button is pressed, and inhaled through the water filter. Designed to look well-used with a few manufacturing defects here and there (maybe these are ten-a-penny on some sci-fi world, and constructed very cheaply to corner some drug market). The asset is constructed from 5 pieces, so the button is moveable and the bottle, bottle water, and pipes can be removed from the main body. Also, the bottle water has its origin at its base, so scaling it along the Z-axis gives the impression of filling/emptying the water level (the albedo colour/alpha can also be changed with the RGBA widget in the Inspector).

As always, for a better impression of the asset inside the Unity engine, please view the YouTube video in the screenshots section.

(metallic PBR workflow used / all models are .FBX format)

Important Note: This asset uses Linear Color Space. To set this up in your scene, in Unity go to Edit >> Project Settings >> Player , then in the Other Settings section of the Inspector in the Color Space* drop-down menu, select Linear. Using other Color Space settings tends to make colours look washed-out / flat.

Tris / Verts Count (taken from Blender):

RMH Narcotics Dispenser 001, 1754 tris, 968 verts. 2K PNGs. Maps: Albedo, Metallic, Normal, AO


The HDRI file used to light the scene was downloaded freely from HDR Labs sIBL Archive.

title: A* View
long_description:
This asset include:
1. A* pathfinding algorithm
2. grid map block area edit
3. Game view Camera Control(same to Scene view)
4. Player Move, path mark

- A* pathfinding algorithm:
Heuristic algorithm include: Manhattan, MaxDXDY, DiagonalShortCut, Euclidean, EuclideanWithG, EuclideanNoSQR. Use heapTree to push/pop Open Node.

- grid map block edit:
The block area of this grid map can be edited in 'Scene View'.
you can add/remove block grid in grid map.

- Game view Camera Control:
It simulate “Scene view” camera control in “Game view”.

- Player Move, path mark:
Click in grid map, If the straight path does not pass the block grid,
Player will move directly to the target position, Otherwise pathfinding is performed.
Before the player moves, The path node on the same line will be merged.
The path is marked with some green square, and the grid involved in pathfinding calculation are marked by blue.

title: Flash Animation Toolset
long_description:
Convert your flash animation for Unity easy!


GitHub Repo | Forum | Web Demo | User Guide | Usage Video | API Reference | Changelog


Features


• Support all transformations like 'rotation', 'skew' and 'scale' (except 3D)

• Support all tweens(classic, motion and etc), keyframes and layers

• Support mask layers

• Support bitmap and vector graphics

• Support all clip color effects like 'brightness', 'tint', 'alpha' and etc

• Support most blending modes (all except Alpha and Erase)

• Simple runtime API for controlling your animations in Unity

• Automatic packing texture atlases of animations with different settings

• Great performance with zero allocations in update loop

• Frame labels to separate sequences in one timeline

• Export marked "for export" clips and main timeline

• Live preview of animations in the Unity editor


Limitations


• Doesn't support any scripts on frames

• Long animations take too much RAM memory and doesn't fit to one texture atlas, that doesn't allow import movies or cut scenes with good quality


Supports Unity 2019.4 and newer. Full C# source code included.

long_description: This is a package of 3D characters of Beagle. It comes with a dog-like animation and cartoon drawing style facial expression, allowing you to recreate innocent dog scenes. These characters can be the star of apps or games, or simply accompany the page to attract dog lovers.

title: VFX Graph - Lightning Effects - Vol. 2
long_description:
18 Lightning Strikes done entirely with Visual Effect Graph.


This package includes:

-18 Lightning Strikes variations (2 customizable VFX Graphs)

-Highly Customizable (change textures, meshes, curves, color, size, shader settings, etc in the inspector)

-Textures (circles, impacts, noises, cracks, flares, etc)

-HDRP and URP only

-Limited Mobile support (high-end mobile devices only)

-Documentation


Originally made in URP, adapted to HDRP.

Visual Effect Graph from the Package Manager is required.

Contact me for any questions (check my profile here in the asset store for contacts).


More VFX Packages:

- Unique Toon Projectiles Vol.1

- Unique Projectiles Vol.1

- Unique Projectiles Vol.2

title: UIFX - Extrude Filter
short_description: UIFX - Extrude Filter is an easy way to add beautiful projection extrusion and long shadow effects to your user interface elements.
long_description:
Simply add this component to your UI GameObject to instantly add stunning projected depth effects or long shadows to your user inferface elements.


Website & Documentation | WebGL Demo | API Reference


Features:

  • High quality rendering of extrusion effects
  • High quality rendering of long shadow effects
  • Supports Unity UI & TextMeshPro
  • Very easy to use
  • Highly optimised
  • Cross-platform
  • Built-in/URP/HDRP
  • Well documented & supported
  • Full C# source code included
  • Effect also works in edit mode (doesn't require entering play mode)
  • Maintains backwards compatibility to Unity 2019.4 (from Unity 6)
  • Supports the popular Text Animator asset for TextMeshPro - NEW

Any questions? Just contact us via Email, at our Discord community or on the Unity Forums.


UIFX - Extrude is part of the 🚀UIFX Bundle 🚀which includes ALL of the UIFX assets (and more) at a discounted price.


This asset uses no third-party code, scripts, assets.

title: Dark Elf Assasin
short_description: 3D Character of Dark Elf Assasin. Has humanoid rig. Has face (ARKit\Apple) and special blendshapes. Modular character. Has color options.
long_description:
Dark Elf Assasin


Please watch video preview


Project 2021.3.21f1


Polycount | NO LOD SYSTEM

SK_DARKELFASSASIN

VERTS 36466

EDGES 69165

FACES 32882


SK_DEA_ALLPARTSTOGETHER

VERTS 49488

EDGES 95080

FACES 45838


SK_DEA_BODYNOARMOR

VERTS 24586

EDGES 46916

FACES 22450


SM_WEAPON

VERTS 244

EDGES 480

FACES 240

SM_WEAPON is a static mesh


MODULARITY

Character is modular. Includes separated parts of body and full body without cuts, head, hair and clothes parts. You can remove or add any part you want. Turn off the pieces that are hidden under the clothes for avoiding body intersection.


RIG

Rigged with Humanoid skeleton with additional bones. Main bones hierarchy has remained untouched. Does not have controls. Easy animations retarget. Full list of additional bones you can find below.


BLENDSHAPES

Has face blendshaped (ARKit\Apple).

Ear morphs (modifying shape into elf ear).

Hair morphs (change hair length).


TEXTURES

PBR Metallic/Roughness Textures

BaseColor, Normal, Metallic, Roughness, AmbientOcclusion, Opacity, MatID.

Texture Resolutions

4K Textures: 4K Body, 4K Head, 4K Hair, 4K Armor1, 4K Armor2 1K Eyes, 1K Eyelashes.


Render pipelines: Built-in, URP, HDRP

How to switch between render pipelines is noted in "How to switch to URP or HDRP.txt" file in folder Shaders\


NOTES

No LOD

No Blueprints

No Animations

No Physics

title: Heightmaps- HillsDry
short_description: x30 HillsDry Heightmaps
long_description:
Step by step instructions to import the landscapes into your level:

1. Install the FREE package Terrain Tools

2. Open the Terrain Toolbox

3. In the Create New Terrain tab, change the default Total Terrain Width and Total Terrain Length to 4096 or 2048

4. In the Create New Terrain tab, check Import Heightmap checkbox after that select the heightmap texture from this pack which you want to use as landscape/terrain

5. Press Create, in a few second your terrain will be imported.

title: Fantasy Icon Pack
long_description:
Complete set of high quality fantasy based icons, ideal for RTS or RPG games, ranging from items, spells, potions, gemstones and treasure. - 79 fantasy-based icons

- 4 different icon frames

- 7 background colour gradients

- All icons are 256x256 pixel transparent PNGs

- Contains both flattened and layered versions of each icon

title: Combined Music Pack: Voidwalkers (Cyberpunk Sci-Fi RPGs Music)
short_description:
"Voidwalkers: Cyberpunk Sci-Fi RPGs Music" is the perfect choice for developers working on sci-fi RPGs, cyberpunk adventures, space operas, and games involving cosmic horror.
​
long_description:
Combined Music Pack: Voidwalkers – Cyberpunk Sci-Fi RPG Soundtracks

Style: Dark Ambient, Orchestral, Cyberpunk, Cosmic Horror, Experimental, Ambient, Electronic, Synthwave

Packs Included:

  • Voidwalkers: Dimensional Rift – 16 tracks
  • Voidwalkers: Elysium Rising – 24 tracks
  • Voidwalkers: Utopia’s Fall – 14 tracks
  • Voidwalkers: Frontier’s Call – 14 tracks
  • Voidwalkers: Urban Shadows – 12 tracks
  • Voidwalkers: Galactic Conquest – 12 tracks

Voidwalkers is a massive, all-in-one music collection built for immersive cyberpunk and sci-fi RPGs. It blends atmospheric soundscapes, cinematic orchestral themes, and futuristic electronic tones to cover every possible mood—whether your game unfolds in neon-lit dystopian streets, vast galactic frontiers, or terrifying cosmic horrors.

This pack is perfect for exploration, combat, story cutscenes, and ambient world-building. Each sub-pack has its own signature feel, giving you the freedom to match music to any setting or gameplay moment.

title: PBR Weapons - Old Rifle - Customizable Textures
long_description:
Based on a classic rifle, this model is game ready.

Features:
- Low Polygon Model. (~5.4k Tris, ~5.4k Verts];
- PBR Textures.
- 4K Texture Resolution. (Works great with 1K and 2K as well)
- Ready for Unity 4 and Unity 5.
- Clean UVs and topology.
- Fully Rigged.
- Procedural Customizable Textures: Several Controls - Direct on Engine interface (powered by Substance);
* Overall Dirt Control
* Wood Color Control
* Wood Dirt Control
* Scratches Control
* Metal Damage Control
* Metal Dirt Control
* 3 Metal Rust Controls

For questions and doubts, please, also mail us at games.lugia@gmail.com

title: VR Keyboard
short_description: A virtual reality keyboard that is easy to set up and designed to work both in Play Mode and in Build. It works using the XR Interaction Toolkit. It is compatible with controllers and hand tracking.
long_description:
This package contains a virtual reality keyboard for use in your Unity project.

It is very easy to use and supports both English and Spanish languages.

It utilizes the XR Interaction Toolkit package and is only compatible with Text Mesh Pro input fields. Works on new Input System


Simply place a prefab in your scene and add a script to the input fields, and it will be ready to use. It can be used with controllers, hand tracking, and gaze input. You can also press the keyboard physically or from a distance using the interaction ray of the XR Interaction Toolkit.


It works in Unity in both Play Mode and Build with any type of headset compatible with the XR Interaction Toolkit.


You can also use it without virtual reality. The keyboard is composed of a canvas and Unity UI buttons.

If your language is not available, you can modify the keyboard to adapt it.

title: GPFX
long_description:
GPFX is a collection of Gaussian Post Effects for Unity 5.

GPFX produces very smooth and natural looking effects, while preserving artistic freedom. The core of the effect framework builds a state-of-the-art optimized Gaussian distribution implementation guaranteeing high-quality results.

The main focus is not performance, but high-quality effects. Nevertheless the included Gaussian Bloom is slightly faster than Unity's standard Bloom.

Key Features
• True Gaussian weighting
• No iterative fake-gaussian
• Multiple blend modes
• Multiple down-sample resolutions
• Full artistic freedom
• Unity Personal & Professional
• Simple API


Included Effects
• Gaussian Blur
• Gaussian Bloom
• Gaussian Dual Bloom
• Anamorphic Lens
• Dizzy Blur

title: RealiScan PhotoRocks - 3D Scanned Rocks
short_description: A package of 10 high-res textured 3d models of rocks, created via a mixed 3d scanning & photogrammetry technique.
long_description:
RealiScan PhotoRocks features 10 models of rocks created via a mixed 3d scanning & photogrammetry technique. All modes have been captured under studio lighting and feature de-lit and balanced diffuse textures, highly detailed baked normal maps and hand-crafted pbr maps. For consistency purposes, the rocks have been obtained from the same area (7 from one and 3 from an area nearby). Without getting into geomorphological details, these rocks are actual field-rocks, rather than river bed stones. What this means is that they have rough edges and chips. They can be scaled up (to a certain extend) and still look believable and realistic. Furthermore, the materials use detail maps (normal and diffuse), which add another level of detail.



Features:


* 3 custom LODs (~2000, ~1000, ~400 tris)


* 4096 x 4096 diffuse, pbr & normal maps (imported at 2048, simply select a higher resolution form the drop down to import at higher resolution)


* custom detail maps (diffuse & normal)


* custom convex collision meshes


* additional displacement maps



The displacement maps included in the package can be used with our tessellation shaders.

The Universal Render Pipeline (URP) is a Scriptable Render Pipeline that is quick and easy to customize, and lets you create optimized graphics across a wide range of platforms.The High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) is a Scriptable Render Pipeline that lets you create cutting-edge, high-fidelity graphics on high-end

title: Physics-Based Puzzle Game Template - HDRP
long_description:
Link of the original game here:: https://kingyaninc.itch.io/new-unity-project



Save 50% by buying another Kingyan Incorporated asset first!!! This even stacks up during a sale !!!

Have you ever wanted to make a first-person physics-based puzzle game? But you don’t have the patience nor the energy to do it? Then this asset will help you! This package contains everything you need to quickly make and upload a pc game, for example, this asset features:

- Basic movement using the WASD keys (duh)

- A crouch mechanic with the ability to block standing up using a trigger with the “crouchZone” tag

- A sprinting mechanic with a stamina bar.

- “realistic” jumping (It takes longer to climb up than fall down).

- The ability to pick-up and throw objects (If you use a hinge joint, you can make physics-based doors!).

- The ability to climb slopes and stairs.

- An AudioManager Component

- Clean and well documented code

- Step and collisions sounds

- The ability to Translate your entire game in different languages

- The ability to change the keybinds of the game in the settings menu

Also you definitely should look at the various HowTo documents and the comments left in the code as the package uses multiple assets (both made by Kingyan and not)..

If you have any questions, you can send an email to lahtal.yanis@gmail.com, and I’ll answer them.

WARNING: Please move the "Resources” outside of “Assets” (the one in the package) folder before launching the game, this folder contains all of the translation files.

title: Terrain Slicer
long_description:
Terrain Slicer

Note: package is not depends on any renderer, it can be used for BuiltIn/URP/HDRP pipelines. Demo scenes are included for BuiltIn and URP pipelines.



With this tool You can split your original large terrain to smaller parts. They still will be connected and each part will contain their portion of layers, trees, details.



Features

- Terrain copy - you can change everything for copied terrain, i.e. layers, layer tiles, trees, details params etc and it will not affect source terrain.

- Terrain splitting from higher to lower heightmap resolution. I.e. You can split 2048x2048 terrain to 4 1024x1024 terrains or 16 terrains with heightmap resolution 512x512. Next each part can be set up independently but stay connected.

- Reduce unused layers - many terrain layers can lead to game slowdown, you can paint terrain with full set of layers and later reduce them by configurable usage threshold or by max allowed layers (i.e. 4 or 8 from Unity recommendations, only most used layers will be left).

- Reduce unused tree/details - original terrain can have multiple unused tree and details models and textures. It's possible to skip them during terrain copy/optimization.

- Copy tree/detail prototypes between terrains - now You can easy copy tree and/or details palette between multiple terrains. Can be useful to create single palette once and copy between all of the scene terrains. Later they can optimized to cleanup unused.

Contains demo scene with source terrain and several optimized versions to compare performance in play mode.
Tested for Unity 2019.3 and above.

title: URP Toon - Stylized Shader
short_description: URP Toon - Stylized Shader is a stylish & unique shader with multiple styles and artist-friendly customization.
long_description:
URP Toon - Stylized Shader is a easy to use adaptive workflow that can help the artist get unique styles!


Features:


Styled Polished Toon, Pixelation, All Unity-supported platforms, all shaders and scripts support (mobile) Android, iOS, WebGL and consoles, VR, AR, Perfect for games on Steam, App Store, Google Play and Nintendo Switch.


Color


Vectorize: Give your textures a bold, toon-like appearance by converting them into a vector format.



Emission: Add a touch of glow to your models with customizable emission colors.


Textures: Rendering: Choose from a range of rendering options to achieve the desired level of detail and realism.



Lighting


Saturation: Adjust the color saturation to create a more vibrant or muted look.


Shadows: Add depth and dimension to your models with customizable shadow options.


Edge: Enhance the edges of your models with a variety of styles and colors.


Posterize: Create a stylized, poster-like appearance with adjustable levels of detail.


Reflection: Add realistic reflections to your models with customizable reflection settings.



Distortion


Wave: Create a wavy, distorted appearance with adjustable wave intensity and frequency.


Flutter: Add a subtle, animated flutter effect to your models.



Effects: Gradient: Apply a stylish gradient effect to your models, with customizable colors and directions.


Shadow Mask: Create a shadowy, silhouette effect with a customizable shadow mask.


Outline: Add a striking outline to your models with adjustable color, width, and style options.



How it will help the developer:


Save time: The Toon Shader's extensive range of customizable options allows developers to quickly and easily create unique, high-quality characters and environments without having to write complex shaders from scratch.


Increase creativity: With its diverse range of features, the Toon Shader inspires creativity and allows developers to experiment with new and innovative visual styles.


Enhance visuals: The shader's ability to add detailed textures, lighting, and effects to 3D models enables developers to create visually stunning scenes and characters that stand out in the Unity Asset Store.


Easy to use: The Toon Shader is designed to be user-friendly, with clear documentation and a straightforward interface that makes it easy for developers of all skill levels to use and customize.


Don't miss out on the opportunity to take your Unity projects to the next level with the Toon Shader. Get it now and start creating stunning, cartoon-like visuals that will make your games and animations stand out from the crowd!

title: URP Water
short_description: URP Water offers great flexibility and art direction control of the water in your game without the hassle and complexity and with less focus on physically accurate rendering.
long_description:
Documentation


Hand-coded for optimal performance and maximum customizability, URP Water is also simple to set up! No matter if your art direction is realistic or stylized, URP Water has plenty of options to match all of your needs.


- Features -


Dynamic Effects

Use any kind of renderer (particles, trail renderer, mesh, etc...) to dynamically affect the surface of the water. Using the provided shader, or your own, you can affect the normals, the foam and the displacement of the water surface.


Vertex Paint

You can manually add foam, mask displacement or change the opacity of the water, using vertex paint.


- Water Parameters -


Refraction

Use color pickers or the gradient editor to control the color of the water.

Select the depth range of the color mapping.

Control the amount of refraction distortion.


Specular

Specular highlights with color and smoothness control.


Normal Maps

Multiple modes with control over tiling, speed and intensity, including:

  • Single Mode: One texture animated in 2 different directions
  • Dual Mode: Two textures animated in 3 different directions
  • Flow Map: Use a texture to define the flow direction of the water
  • Facet: For a low poly-look
  • Far Map: A different normal map is animated in 2 different directions when the water reaches a certain distance from the camera. You have control over what distance it happens.

Reflection

  • Cubemap
  • Reflection Probe
  • Planar Reflection

Foam

  • Edge foam
  • Ripples
  • White caps

Caustics

  • 2D texture
  • 3D texture
  • React to shadows and light direction
  • Angle mask

Displacement

  • Gerstner Wave ( up to 4 waves )

Tessellation

  • Edge length tessellation: the subdivisions adapt to the distance from the camera and the relative size of the edges.

Options

  • Double-sided
  • World space UV
  • Orthographic camera support
  • Vertex color effects
    • Add foam
    • Displacement mask
    • Alpha mask

- Includes -

  • Standard URP Water shader
  • Tessellated URP Water shader
  • Custom Inspector
  • Example shaders for Dynamic effects ( foam and normal/displacement )
  • Water Mask Shader
  • Dynamic effects script
  • Planar reflection script
  • Extensive Demo scenes with every feature explained
  • A few example textures

title: Animator Optimizer
short_description: Optimize animators with LODs. Control update rate, root motion, and bone quality to boost performance in large scenes.
long_description:
Animator Optimizer improves performance by dynamically applying LODs to animators. Control update frequency by distance, adjust bone quality, and optionally disable root motion for far-away characters. A lightweight and flexible system designed to boost frame rates in projects with many animated characters.



Documentation | Discord | Publisher Page



BATCHING

Features smart batching which splits the total amount of animators into groups and optimizes each group in a separate frame which further smooths out the CPU.



BONE QUALITY AND ROOT MOTION

You can not only adjust bone quality for better performance, but also force-disable root motion on distant animators, saving resources where such accuracy isn’t needed.



COMPATIBILITY

Works with any gameobject with an animator component.



RENDERING PIPELINE

As this asset doesn't rely on any rendering pipeline it works on all and any pipeline (built-in, URP & HDRP) but the demo is made for URP.



APIs

The system offers APIs to help you easily register and unregister animators from the optimizer.



PACKAGE

The package comes with the clean and organized source code, a documentation with a video tutorial and a URP demo.



Leave your feedback and tell us what you think. I would really appreciate it.


If you have any questions, need support or have technical issues (bugs), please email me or use the discord server.

title: Medieval Village - Normalgon
short_description: A colorful, stylized medieval village, with hand-crafted normals on low-poly meshes for style and performance.
long_description:
Normalgon: Medieval Village is a simple and fun set of models for prototyping your game, with several unique features:


Beautiful and Optimized

Normalgon models use (optional!) hand-sculpted normals applied to a low-poly mesh, for a great smoothed-but-minimal look without the millions of polygons. Even better, all models use baked-in vertex colors instead of separate materials. Altogether, this gives a significant performance boost on XR and mobile devices, without sacrificing detail for high-powered devices. It's a lot of extra work for me, and a great result for you!


Pick Your Style

Every model has two versions- smoothed, or flat-shaded. Use whichever you like best!


Below is a list of included models, and I'll be happy to add more if there's something else you need - just ask!

title: Kingdom of Light - Standard Edition
long_description:
Kingdom of Light - Standard Edition
is an all-in-one audio solution for film and games that demands professional music production. KoL - Standard Edition includes 72 selected cues from the KoL modules & Haunted Nature to delivery a large catalog of high-quality symphonic music ranging from Themes, Towns & Taverns, Combat, Dungeon & Caves, Mystical to breathtaking Time of Day exploration music and Special event cues to enhance your high-fantasy adventure games and films. This bundle pack is suitable for land masses ranging from 10 to over 25 sq miles or to increase your current in-game music just shy of 2 hrs! Take your project to the next level with this beautifully crafted and comprehensive musical suite.

The Music
Early on in the development of this music suite I decided that in order to bring a film-like experience with lasting appeal, limiting the scoring to the flexibilty and pallete of sounds of the orchestra was the only way to go. Nearly all instruments of the orchestra are put to use with splashes of male and female choirs ...read more

The Mood
'Epic Fantasy Adventure' may have been a better title as it prefectly describes 'Kingdom of Light'. The atmosphere of KoL is broad in scope ranging from sentimental, hopeful, mystical, brooding, ferocious, to purposeful and playful, all for different environments one may encounter in an epic fantasy adventure...read more
